document_data.mainbody:
he Corpse-Tearers, or the Four-Eyed Giants, was a military organization within the Sevenfold Mazework of the Great Dismal Delve.
The Corpse-Tearers were made up of 1,200 umber hulks and dao commanders.
This well-disciplined unit served as auxillary shock troops and led burrowing maneuvers for larger forces.
The Sevenfold Mazework within the Great Dismal Delve served as base of all dao military organizations.
